main.name: Ahmad_Noor
main.description: i'm Highly motivated self-taught Software Engineer Who Specialized in Javascript
main.bio: i'm included in one of the most Talented people in Pakistan who has started their journey without Computer Science Degree.i impressed and motivate a lot of peoples through my skills.I love to learn and teach JavaScript & React. I have worked on different client and server side web development frameworks, languages and databases. Full-Stack javaScript Developer with expertise in both frontend & backend.Always contribute to open source projects & focused on performance related things

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
